But for two straight couples obtaining marriage licenses , Washington County 's office of Assessment and Taxation was quiet Monday immediately following the strike down of Oregon 's ban on gay marriage .
Director Rich Hobernicht said he had not heard from any same - sex couples wishing to marry , but that the county 's marriage license system has been updated to reflect the ruling .

Oregon became the seventh state where a federal judge has struck down a ban on gay marriage since the U.S. Supreme Court last year invalidated key sections of the federal Defense of Marriage Act .
